name: Burrata Chicken Sliders
author: BelGioioso Cheese
summary: Burrata adds extra creamy goodness to grilled chicken sliders.
ingredients: 6  thinly sliced boneless chicken breasts (or cutlets)
1 (8 ounce) package BelGioioso burrata cheese, sliced to include filling
directions: Cut chicken breasts in half to fit a slider bun
Season both sides of chicken with salt and pepper
Lightly oil a grill or pan-grill over medium heat
Grill chicken until no longer pink inside, about 5 minutes per side
Toast buns by grilling them cut-side down
For each sandwich, layer cooked chicken breast, tomato slice, fresh basil leaf, and burrata slice between the toasted slider buns
